Adventure.Component
Class Actor

java.lang.Object
  Adventure.Component.BaseObject
      Adventure.Component.Actor
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameActor, GameObject
public class Actor
extends BaseObject
implements GameActor

This class serves as the core implementation of the GameActor interface, and provides base functionality for any non-player characters within this game.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Firmy

Field Summary
private  boolean hasMetPlayer
          This field marks whether this Actor has met the player before.
private  boolean hidden
          This field marks whether this actor has a hidden status.
private  GameDialog initialDialog
          This field holds the GameDialog that will first be called when this Actor has a conversation with the player.
private  java.util.ArrayList<GameItem> inventory
          This field holds the ArrayList of GameItem that is this Actor's inventory.
private  GameLocation location
          This field will be used to hold this Actor's current location.
private  GameLocation previousLocation
          This field will be used to hold the location that this Actor was last in.

Constructor Detail

Actor

public Actor()
This constructor will initialize all the relevant fields for this Actor. It will also add this Actor to the Level.gameObjects array.

This method will check whether this GameActor is currently hidden.

Returns:
True if this Actor is hidden, false otherwise.

hasItem

public boolean hasItem(java.lang.String itemName)
This method is used to determine if this Actor has a GameItem in their inventory that has the specified name.

Specified by:
hasItem in interface GameActor
Parameters:
itemName - The String name of the item to check for.
Returns:
True if the item is in this Actor's inventory, false otherwise.

hasMetPlayer

public boolean hasMetPlayer()
This will determine if this Actor has had it's status marked as having previously met the Player. This will be true automatically once the player has first spoken to this Actor.

Specified by:
hasMetPlayer in interface GameActor
Returns:
True if the Actor has met the player, False otherwise.

move

public void move(java.lang.String direction)
This method is used to move this Actor through the exit that is in their current location that is in the direction specified.

Specified by:
move in interface GameActor
Parameters:
direction - This is a String that represents the direction of the exit to use.

pickUpItem

public void pickUpItem(java.lang.String itemName)
This method will get a GameItem from this Actor's location and add it to their inventory.

Specified by:
pickUpItem in interface GameActor
Parameters:
itemName - The name of the item to pick up.

Parameters:
